LanguageData.JRWGeosternbergia.label: Geosternbergia
LanguageData.JRWGeosternbergia.description:
-- > INGEN INTERNAL CASE FILE #03878-1985 [GEOSTERNBERGIA STERNBERGI] CODENAME: VENT >3728
A pteranodontid reptile with a distinct blue hide and a lovely tan crest. Their beauty is often short lived, as most encounters end in mindless screeching and multiple flesh wounds.
